text: Be tardid, Alloh taolo az mu'minon conho va amvolasonro ʙa [ʙahoi] inki ʙihist ʙaroi onon ʙosad, xaridaast, hamon kasone, ki dar rohi Alloh taolo mecangand va [kofironro] mekusand va [jo xud ʙa dasti onho] kusta mesavand. [In podos] ʙa unvoni va'dai rostu durust dar Tavrot va Incil va Qur'on ʙar uhdai Ust. Va kist, ki az Alloh taolo ʙa pajmoni xes vafodortar ast? Pas, [ej mu'minon] ʙa muomilae, ki ʙo U kardaed, sodmon ʙosed va in hamon [rastagori va] komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast
